articles.author: Nur Hikmah Md Ali
articles.title: Asia markets open mostly higher ahead of key China inflation data - CNBC
articles.description: China's August consumer price index fell 0.4% year over year, missing expectations of a 0.2% drop by economists polled by Reuters.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets rose Wednesday, tracking gains on Wall Street, as hopes for a rate cut by the Federal Reserve rose, while investors also assessed August inflation data from China.
